notes: Calcium nitrate is a strongly hygroscopic oxidizer; while it can contribute orange-red coloration, its moisture sensitivity limits its usefulness in many APCP or solid compositions.

procurement_sources.acquisition_restrictions: oxidizer; restricted carriers and hazmat considerations
procurement_sources.notes: Hobby-accessible source for smaller calcium nitrate quantities.

procurement_sources.acquisition_restrictions: industrial supplier; likely business account and larger MOQs required
procurement_sources.notes: Bulk distributor for industrial-scale calcium nitrate supply.

procurement_sources.acquisition_restrictions: industrial / lab supplier; business or institutional customers preferred
procurement_sources.notes: U.S.-based supplier offering higher-purity calcium nitrate in various package sizes.
